p: Piper loretoanum is used by the Chayahuita in Peru in the treatment of leismaniasis, cuts and gastrointestinal ulcer. The dried leaves were reduced in powder and sprinkled on the leishmaniasis-related ulcer. Other than that, the fresh leaves are crushed and applied as a poultice to treat cuts or boiled with water for 2 h and drink to treat internal ulcers [ 237].
